https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Hello dsymonds@golang.org, rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

I'm going to hold off submitting this until either
http://codereview.appspot.com/4972056/ is submitted or Russ says he
doesn't want to include it in this weekly. Either way, tomorrow.

> http://codereview.appspot.com/4968070/diff/3001/doc/devel/weekly.html#newcode29

> is this worth mentioning?

Probably not. Dropped.
